data.Name: Ken Car$on
data.Bio: Kenyatta L Frazier Jr. (b. April 11, 2000), known as Ken Car$on, is an American recording artist and producer from Atlanta, Georgia. Ken met record producer TM88 in 2015 after moving to South Atlanta and signed to 808 Mafia as a rapper. In 2019, he signed to Playboi Carti's label Opium. He released his first two EPs, Boy Barbie and Teen X , in 2020. The latter featured his biggest song to date, Yale. Ken kicked off 2021 by releasing Lost Files on SoundCloud Read more on Last.fm
